PlayAnnouncement.Label: PlayAnnouncement1
PlayAnnouncement.displayProp: Media URI / Text for TTS**00**Welcome to the long time in queue demo. No agents are here to assist you, but if your call has no place to land, it may wait in queue in empathy with callers everywhere.

useTextTTS.displayPropName: Use Text-To-Speech instead of Audio file

properties.Media-URI-Or-Text: Welcome to the long time in queue demo. No agents are here to assist you, but if your call has no place to land, it may wait in queue in empathy with callers everywhere.

PlayAndCollect.Label: press1toContinue
PlayAndCollect.displayProp: Media URI / Text for TTS**00**All agents are still busy. If there even ARE any. Press one to Continue to hold or any other key to exit.

useTextTTS.displayPropName: Use Text-To-Speech instead of Audio file

properties.Media-URI-Or-Text: All agents are still busy. If there even ARE any. Press one to Continue to hold or any other key to exit.

PlayAnnouncement.Label: PlayAnnouncement2
PlayAnnouncement.displayProp: Media URI / Text for TTS**00**Thanks for waiting but there are still no agents available. This is just a parking place for calls that didn't get handled by automation, and perhaps a reminder that nobody likes long hold times!

useTextTTS.displayPropName: Use Text-To-Speech instead of Audio file

properties.Media-URI-Or-Text: Thanks for waiting but there are still no agents available. This is just a parking place for calls that didn't get handled by automation, and perhaps a reminder that nobody likes long hold times!

properties.Comment: Simulates the (poor) caller experience when no agents are available for a prolonged period. Use as a sink for demos in which agent delivery is not the point, and blocking calls is the goal.

PlayAnnouncement.Label: PlayAnnouncement3
PlayAnnouncement.displayProp: Media URI / Text for TTS**00**Many calls can be automated by offering callers an online mobile experience. Ask your sales rep for details about the Avaya Mobile Experience. This workflow has no such automation.

useTextTTS.displayPropName: Use Text-To-Speech instead of Audio file

properties.Media-URI-Or-Text: Many calls can be automated by offering callers an online mobile experience. Ask your sales rep for details about the Avaya Mobile Experience. This workflow has no such automation.

PlayAnnouncement.Label: callerDetails
PlayAnnouncement.displayProp: Media URI / Text for TTS**00**Details about the caller would be visible to an agent, who would know information like whether or not they have authenticated. But there are no agents.

useTextTTS.displayPropName: Use Text-To-Speech instead of Audio file

properties.Media-URI-Or-Text: Details about the caller would be visible to an agent, who would know information like whether or not they have authenticated. But there are no agents.
